forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. Southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the dawn unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the air feels crisp and invigorating, carrying whispers of the beautiful day ahead. Currently, the skies are mostly clear, allowing glimpses of the golden horizon, though a gentle marine layer may linger in pockets, keeping a delicate hush along the coast. The forecast promises a high of 74, with temperatures gracefully easing into the early afternoon. A zephyr from the southwest dances through the streets, at times lively, lending energy to the bustling city. 

Dress comfortably in layers—perhaps a light sweater paired with breathable fabrics to navigate the undulating warmth throughout the day. With such inviting weather, it beckons one to wander, to perhaps enjoy a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or to settle into a café, sipping a warm brew while watching the world glide by. The promise of sunshine against the backdrop of the iconic cityscape paints a pleasant canvas, inviting connections and stories to unfold against the vibrant silhouette of San Francisco.
